42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim, from his father, that the Messenger of Allah said:"Whoever keeps a dog. Except a dog for hunting or herding livestock, two Qirats will be deducted from his reward each day

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي إِمْسَاكِ الْكَلْبِ لِلصَّيْدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession For Keeping Dogs For Hunting
